starvationevasion.sim

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.sim.Simulator

  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main API point of the Starvation Evasion Simulator. This constructor should be called once at the start of each game by the Server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Simulator(int startYear)
      This constructor should be called once at the start of each game by the Server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      int getLandUsed(EnumRegion region, EnumFood food) 
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      int nextTurn(java.util.ArrayList<Policy> cards)
      The server should call nextTurn(cards) when it is ready to advance the simulator a turn (Constant.YEARS_PER_TURN years)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulator

        public Simulator(int startYear)
        This constructor should be called once at the start of each game by the Server. Initializes the model Generates a random 80 card deck for each player (both human and AI players)
        Parameters:
        startYear - year the game is starting. Generally this will be Constant.FIRST_YEAR.

    • Method Detail

      • drawCards

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> drawCards(EnumRegion playerRegion)
        The server must call this for each playerRegion before the first turn and during each turn's draw phase. This method will return the proper number of cards from the top of the given playerRegion's deck taking into account cards played and discarded by that player.
        Parameters:
        playerRegion - region of player who id given the drawn cards.
        Returns:
        collection of cards.

      • nextTurn

        public int nextTurn(java.util.ArrayList<Policy> cards)
        The server should call nextTurn(cards) when it is ready to advance the simulator a turn (Constant.YEARS_PER_TURN years)
        Parameters:
        cards - List of PolicyCards played this turn.
        Returns:
        the simulation year after nextTurn() has finished.

      • getLandUsed

        public int getLandUsed(EnumRegion region,
                       EnumFood food)
        Parameters:
        region - Any US or world region.
        food - Any food catagory.
        Returns:
        Number of square km used for farming of the given food in the given region.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
